channel.title: DragonTech Recruiting
channel.description:
DragonTech is a group of RS players who disapprove of the way JaGex has done things and abused many players wishes our goal is to create a server and client to allow players who are fed up with RS a new expierence by using already developed items and adding our own. Our only problem is we have no real development team asside from myself. I am an alright spriter if you count sprites for gba roms, also i am trying to learn to code and to learn to script. My past expierence in development include rom hacking and adding graphics and miniture scripting, Also used rpg maker XP and 2002 for a while although didnt use the scripting features that much. So in other words I have ideas and would like some people who are willing to help me and my small team of testers being as they know nothing of graphics or of scripting.
Head of Development Verac(AKA Dragon_Tamer)
Coder: (Im Trying to learn how to code/script) X-J-K-X Si Force Play For Keeps moparclient
Coder- sub coding: Command makers : - -
Void makers: - -
Client developer Firewatcher0 - -
Testers: Frost Krazy Kru Demon Tamer
Forums Devloper(also in with forums graphics): play for keeps
Graphics/Forum Graphics: -
Note that we have a website although it is free and we would enjoy any additional help also for the link pm me on here or email me.
Other Info Needed To Join: AIM Name: Email: Real Name: Name used on DragonTech forums?: Past projects: proof of skills/sample work: position wanted:

item.title: DragonTech Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Verac Verac
item.description:
@Verac wrote:

hey no need to get all upset about it wow sounds like youre upset a little hope its not something bad ya know. im going to take it as constructive critisism and not as obscene language and flamming.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2007, 09:47:21 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but you will have to deal as im still recruiting and its easier to bump a thread then make a new one so heres what I still need, I need people who are good with graphics, As in making them not changing the code to make it a new color or texture as im completely capable of editing the code for that myself, Also My current members and future members check the Forums at least once a week for updates on plans
(my forums not mopar forums)

Read full topic

item.title: DragonTech Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Verac Verac
item.description:
@Verac wrote:

As for taking the layout i agree with x-j-k-x its a layout as for chems statement i didnt take it i based mine off of it want credit for the way it looks? Ok credit to chem cause I used his layout as a base but you cant say you havent used things as a base i just figured being as its something small that no credit was needed if it was graphics thats a different story:

X-J-K-X you are accepted and ty for applying ill send you an email asap, Same for you Si Force

My message: If your going to accept me. Please make sure you talk to me. If you add me on msn, and i don’t get a message, or any link to forums within 3 days, i will quit… I’m also not waiting weeks and weeks to code… I don’t want to be apart of anything breaking moparscape rules, or if you leech of other servers. If i’m not accepted, hope the project goes well ;).
